entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 12:58 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
